code:
---
title: Very simple diagram
---
stateDiagram
  direction TB

  accTitle: This is the accessible title
  accDescr: This is an accessible description

  classDef notMoving fill:white
  classDef movement font-style:italic
  classDef badBadEvent fill:#f00,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke-width:2px,stroke:yellow

  [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]--> Still
  Still --> [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
  Still --> Moving
  Moving --> Still
  Moving --> Crash
  Crash --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

  class Still notMoving
  class Moving, Crash movement
  class Crash badBadEvent
  class end badBadEvent

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 的逻辑。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

extra.repo_description: Mermaid wrapper in order to be able to perform server-side svg renderers without headless browsers DOM.
